highlights: Most central: Alyosha Karamazov (62), Dmitri Karamazov (53), Fyodor Karamazov (35), Ivan Karamazov (31)
story_summary: Alyosha returns late to the hermitage and finds Father Païssy reading the Gospel over the elder's coffin. As Alyosha prays and dozes, he envisions a joyous wedding feast at Cana where the elder appears alive and invites him to join the celebration of new gladness. Awakening filled with rapture, Alyosha embraces the earth, feeling a profound connection to the world and resolves to love and forgive all, marking a transformative moment in his life.
evidence_quotes: Father Païssy, reading the Gospel in solitude over the coffin
He kissed it weeping, sobbing and watering it with his tears
